name: Constella
description:
We all have been through some tragic or significant loss, and this is our tribute to them. Constella is a journey in search of acceptance and overcoming.

To complete this exercise, try to embrace that mayor loss you had.

Wish you well.

*

*

Game developed by Ashes (tw: @Ashes_gamedev):

-Mario Lois (tw: @ML_Shad) - Designer, Producer

-Álvaro Marco (tw: @amarco_dev) - Designer, Writer
